desc: Tandem Inflatable BodyBoards make bodyboarding more fun! Our motto is "It takes two" when riding the crest of a wave. Great for friends, families and perfect for vacation rentals at resorts and beach stores. As seen on SHARK TANK

layout.text: The easiest and safest way to enjoy the ocean is on a Inflatable Tandem Bodyboard. Designed for two people to easily catch waves with no experience.
